[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genesislcap/foundation-shell](./foundation-shell.md) &gt; [DefaultApp](./foundation-shell.defaultapp.md) &gt; [registerAssets](./foundation-shell.defaultapp.registerassets.md)

## DefaultApp.registerAssets() method

Register assets from either a globed dynamic import or some predefined AppAssets instance. This is a one time operation. Assets had be subsequently registered and deregistered using their individual APIs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerAssets(assets: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  assets | any | [AppAssets](./foundation-shell.appassets.md). |

**Returns:**

void
